"Smart Toothbrush with Voice Commands" - A toothbrush that can be controlled by voice commands. Users can set the toothbrush to a specific time and pressure, and the toothbrush will automatically start brushing at the designated time and pressure. This feature is perfect for people with disabilities or those who have difficulty holding and using a regular toothbrush.

"Toothbrush with built-in Timer and Pressure Sensor" - A toothbrush that has a built-in timer and pressure sensor. The timer ensures that users brush for the recommended two minutes, while the pressure sensor alerts users if they are applying too much pressure while brushing. This feature is perfect for people who tend to brush too hard or for too long.

"Toothbrush with UV Light" - A toothbrush that has a built-in UV light. The UV light can be used to check for cavities and other dental issues. This feature is perfect for people who want to take an extra step in maintaining their oral health.

"Toothbrush with App Connectivity" - A toothbrush that can be connected to a smartphone app. The app can track brushing habits, provide personalized brushing recommendations, and even order replacement toothbrush heads. This feature is perfect for people who want to keep track of their brushing habits and make sure they are brushing properly.

"Toothbrush with Built-in Microphone" - A toothbrush that has a built-in microphone. The microphone can be used to sing or hum while brushing, which can help relax and make brushing more enjoyable. This feature is perfect for people who tend to get stressed or anxious while brushing their teeth.
